holder_name.description: Name of the credit card holder. Required if the type is credit_card

number.description: Card number. Required if the type is credit_card

expire_date.description: Expiry date of the card. Required if the type is credit_card

cvv.description: CVV of the card. Required if the type is credit_card

first_name.description: First name of the recipient. Required if the type cash_on_delivery

last_name.description: Last name of the recipient. Required if the type cash_on_delivery

address.description: Address of the recipient. Required if the type cash_on_delivery

swift.description: Swift code of the bank. Required if the type bank_transfer

iban.description: IBAN of the bank. Required if the type bank_transfer

name.description: Name of the bank. Required if the type bank_transfer
